solution.text:
Given pair of equations are:
_{i}_x + y = _{{3*i}}_ ------(1)
And x - _{i}_y = _{{5*i}}_ --------(2)
Finding 2 solutions of each equation to draw the graphs of the equations
x 0 3 - x 0 _{{5*i}}_
y _{{3*i}}_ 0 - y -5 0
Plot graph for obtained data:
Where m = _{{3*i}}_ and n = _{{5*i}}_
We observe that there is a point P common to both the lines AB and CD.
So the solution of the pair of linear equation is x = _{{trunc((3*i*i+5*Decimal(i))/(i*i+1),2)}}_ and y = _{{trunc((3*Decimal(i)-5*i*i)/(i*i+1),2)}}_

content.text:
